L01-課文中英對照(Firsts in Life).docx.chinese: 在這個月的《龍騰高中新聞》中，我們的記者Jeremy訪問了三位學生，談論一些他們人生中難忘的初次經歷。閱讀以下他們的回答。

L01-課文中英對照(Firsts in Life).docx.english:
Robbie: A First Online Class 
- A few years ago, I took an online class for the first time. I never thought that I could take classes in my pajamas! I also enjoyed using online tools such as Kahoot! and Quizlet. There were some memorable moments, too. Once, my grandmother suddenly came into the room. She yelled at me to try her perfect beef noodles. My microphone was on, so the rest of the students heard it and started laughing. Another time, our teacher accidentally turned on a funny filter on her camera. She looked like an alien on the screen, so my classmates and I had another good laugh. Online lessons were fun sometimes, but I still found that I enjoyed seeing others in person more.

L01-課文中英對照(Firsts in Life).docx.chinese:
Robbie：第一次的線上課程
幾年前，我第一次上線上課程。我從未想過我可以穿著睡衣上課！我也從使用像是Kahoot!和Quizlet這樣的線上工具獲得樂趣。還有一些難忘的時刻。有一次，我奶奶突然走進房間。她大聲叫我試試她做的完美牛肉麵。我的麥克風是開著的，所以其他的學生都聽到了，也就開始笑了起來。另外有一次，我們的老師不小心在她的攝影機上開啟了一個好笑的濾鏡。她在螢幕上看起來像個外星人，所以我的同學們和我又大笑了起來。線上課程有時候很有趣，但我還是發現我更喜歡親自見到其他人。

L01-課文中英對照(Firsts in Life).docx.english:
Claire: A First Failure
 I can still recall　my first crash-and-burn moment in school. For a group presentation last year, I was the speaker for my team. However, I didn’t take the task seriously and skipped several group meetings. When the time came for me to step onto the stage, I was nervous and unprepared. Of course, I ruined the presentation and felt embarrassed in front of my classmates and teacher. We got a very low grade, and I felt depressed about letting the team down. The failure really upset　me, but I reflected on it and learned from my mistake. These days, this memory reminds me to prepare well and make sure that I always put my team first!

L01-課文中英對照(Firsts in Life).docx.chinese:
Claire：第一次失敗
我仍然能記起我在學校第一次徹底失敗的時刻。去年的一次小組報告中，我是我們小組的報告者。然而，我沒有認真對待這個任務並且翹掉了好幾次小組會議。當輪到我要上臺的時候，我緊張不安且毫無準備。可以想見，我搞砸了報告並且在同學和老師面前感到尷尬。我們得到了一個很低的分數，而我對於讓團隊失望感到沮喪。這次的失敗真的讓我很難過，但我認真思考這件事並從我的錯誤中學習。現在，這個回憶提醒我要好好準備並確保我總是把團隊放在第一位！

L01-課文中英對照(Firsts in Life).docx.english:
Nancy: A First Foreign Visit
My first trip abroad—to Seoul, South Korea—was unforgettable. The city’s streets were busy, and delicious foods like Korean barbecue and kimchi were all around me. I soon realized that the markets were a treat for my other senses since cheerful K-pop and colorful clothes were everywhere. I visited several old buildings and dressed up in traditional Korean clothes. While I was there, I tried to talk to locals. My Korean was poor, but fortunately, everyone was very friendly. At the end of the trip, I left with a lot of great memories, and I can’t wait to go back someday!

L01-課文中英對照(Firsts in Life).docx.chinese:
Nancy：第一次出國旅行
我第一次出國旅行──去南韓的首爾──令我難忘。這個城市的街道繁忙，像是韓式烤肉和辛奇（韓式泡菜）這類的美食圍繞著我。很快，我就發現市場對我的其他感官是一種享受，因為歡樂的韓國流行樂和色彩繽紛的衣服到處都是。我參觀了幾棟古老建築並穿上了傳統韓服。當我在那裡時，我試著與當地人交談。我的韓語很差，但幸運的是，每個人都非常友善。旅行尾聲時，我帶著許多美好的回憶離開，而且迫不及待有一天能再回去！
